mapper.sql: select prob_list_id, prob_list_num, prob_list_name, prob_iscompleted, prob_list_descrip, prob_list_source, prob_list_start_time, prob_list_end_time, prob_list_ATA, dept_id, prob_list_actual_end_time, prob_list_head, prob_list_our_head, prob_list_status, prob_list_evaluation, prob_star, prob_isoptimize, prob_list_clas, prob_list_tag, prob_list_tips from bus_prob_list
mapper.select: select a.prob_list_id, a.prob_list_num, a.prob_list_name, a.prob_iscompleted, a.prob_list_descrip, a.prob_list_source, a.prob_list_start_time, a.prob_list_end_time, a.prob_list_ATA, a.dept_id, a.prob_list_actual_end_time, a.prob_list_head, a.prob_list_our_head, a.prob_list_status, a.prob_list_evaluation, a.prob_star, a.prob_isoptimize, a.prob_list_clas, a.prob_list_tag, a.prob_list_tips, f.prob_final_solution_id as sub_prob_final_solution_id, f.prob_process_id as sub_final_prob_process_id, f.prob_final_solution as sub_prob_final_solution, f.prob_MI as sub_prob_MI, f.prob_final_status as sub_prob_final_status, t.prob_temp_solution_id as sub_prob_temp_solution_id, t.prob_process_id as sub_temp_prob_process_id, t.prob_temp_solution as sub_prob_temp_solution,t.prob_temp_cat as sub_prob_temp_cat,t.prob_temp_file_num as sub_prob_temp_file_num,t.prob_temp_status as sub_prob_temp_status, r.prob_reason_id as sub_prob_reason_id, r.prob_process_id as sub_reason_prob_process_id, r.prob_reason as sub_prob_reason, s.prob_star as sub_prob_star,s.prob_star_basis as sub_prob_star_basis,s.prob_star_time as sub_prob_star_time from ( select bus_prob_list.prob_list_id , bus_prob_list.prob_list_num, bus_prob_list.prob_list_name, prob_iscompleted, bus_prob_list.prob_list_descrip, prob_list_source, prob_list_start_time, prob_list_end_time, prob_list_ATA, dept_id, prob_list_actual_end_time, prob_list_head, prob_list_our_head, prob_list_status, prob_list_evaluation, prob_star, prob_isoptimize, prob_list_clas, prob_list_tag, prob_list_tips, p.prob_process_id as prob_process_id, p.prob_current_process, p.prob_process_num from bus_prob_list left join bus_prob_process p on bus_prob_list.prob_list_id = p.prob_list_id where p.prob_current_process = 1 order by p.prob_process_num desc limit 1 ) a left join bus_prob_final_solution f on f.prob_process_id = a.prob_process_id left join bus_prob_temp_solution t on t.prob_process_id = a.prob_process_id left join bus_prob_reason r on r.prob_process_id = a.prob_process_id left join (select * from bus_prob_star where prob_list_id = #{probListId} order by prob_star_time desc limit 1) s on s.prob_list_id = a.prob_list_id where a.prob_list_id = #{probListId}

select a.prob_list_id, a.prob_list_num, a.prob_list_name, a.prob_iscompleted, a.prob_list_descrip, a.prob_list_source, a.prob_list_start_time, a.prob_list_end_time, a.prob_list_ATA, a.dept_id, a.prob_list_actual_end_time, a.prob_list_head, a.prob_list_our_head, a.prob_list_status, a.prob_list_evaluation, a.prob_star, a.prob_isoptimize, a.prob_list_clas, a.prob_list_tag, a.prob_list_tips, f.prob_final_solution as sub_prob_final_solution, f.prob_MI as sub_prob_MI, f.prob_final_status as sub_prob_final_status, t.prob_temp_solution as sub_prob_temp_solution,t.prob_temp_cat as sub_prob_temp_cat,t.prob_temp_file_num as sub_prob_temp_file_num,t.prob_temp_status as sub_prob_temp_status, r.prob_reason as sub_prob_reason, s.prob_star as sub_prob_star,s.prob_star_basis as sub_prob_star_basis,s.prob_star_time as sub_prob_star_time from ( select bus_prob_list.prob_list_id , bus_prob_list.prob_list_num, bus_prob_list.prob_list_name, prob_iscompleted, bus_prob_list.prob_list_descrip, prob_list_source, prob_list_start_time, prob_list_end_time, prob_list_ATA, dept_id, prob_list_actual_end_time, prob_list_head, prob_list_our_head, prob_list_status, prob_list_evaluation, prob_star, prob_isoptimize, prob_list_clas, prob_list_tag, prob_list_tips, p.prob_process_id as prob_process_id, p.prob_current_process, p.prob_process_num from bus_prob_list left join bus_prob_process p on bus_prob_list.prob_list_id = p.prob_list_id where p.prob_current_process = 1 order by p.prob_process_num desc limit 1 ) a left join bus_prob_final_solution f on f.prob_process_id = a.prob_process_id left join bus_prob_temp_solution t on t.prob_process_id = a.prob_process_id left join bus_prob_reason r on r.prob_process_id = a.prob_process_id left join (select * from bus_prob_star where prob_list_id = #{probListId} order by prob_star_time desc) s on s.prob_list_id = a.prob_list_id where a.prob_list_id = #{probListId}
mapper.insert:
insert into bus_prob_list
prob_list_num, prob_list_name, prob_iscompleted, prob_list_descrip, prob_list_source, prob_list_start_time, prob_list_end_time, prob_list_ATA, dept_id, prob_list_actual_end_time, prob_list_head, prob_list_our_head, prob_list_status, prob_list_evaluation, prob_star, prob_isoptimize, prob_list_clas, prob_list_tag, prob_list_tips,
#{probListNum}, #{probListName}, #{probIscompleted}, #{probListDescrip}, #{probListSource}, #{probListStartTime}, #{probListEndTime}, #{probListAta}, #{deptId}, #{probListActualEndTime}, #{probListHead}, #{probListOurHead}, #{probListStatus}, #{probListEvaluation}, #{probStar}, #{probIsoptimize}, #{probListClas}, #{probListTag}, #{probListTips},
mapper.delete:
delete from bus_prob_list where prob_list_id in
#{probListId}
